data.scheme_name: Existing - 115BAA: Corporate Tax Rate For Certain Domestic Companies
data.benefits: Existing domestic companies have an option to pay income tax at a lower rate of 22%.
data.conditions:
1. Certain deductions, Exemptions And Incentives are not allowed such as Special provisions in respect of newly established Units in Special Economic Zones Additional Depreciation, Tea development account, Site Restoration Fund Deduction in respect of expenditure on specified business Expenditure on agricultural extension project Expenditure on skill development project Deductions in respect of profits and gains from industrial undertakings or enterprises engaged in infrastructure development, etc. Deductions in respect of profits and gains by an undertaking or enterprise engaged in development of Special Economic Zone Special provision in respect of eligible startups Deduction in respect of profits and gains from certain industrial undertakings other than infrastructure development undertakings Only these are allowed : Deduction in respect of employment of new employees Deduction in respect of certain inter-corporate dividends. 

2. Cannot set-off any loss carried forward from earlier years if such losses were incurred in respect of the above mentioned deductions/exemptions. 

3. If a Company opts to pay tax under these sections then it cannot be subsequently withdrawn.

 4. For Sec 115BAA company needs to file From 10-IC before due date of filing return.
data.prerequisites:
1. Certain deductions, Exemptions And Incentives are not allowed such as Special provisions in respect of newly established Units in Special Economic Zones Additional Depreciation, Tea development account, Site Restoration Fund Deduction in respect of expenditure on specified business Expenditure on agricultural extension project Expenditure on skill development project Deductions in respect of profits and gains from industrial undertakings or enterprises engaged in infrastructure development, etc. Deductions in respect of profits and gains by an undertaking or enterprise engaged in development of Special Economic Zone Special provision in respect of eligible startups Deduction in respect of profits and gains from certain industrial undertakings other than infrastructure development undertakings Only these are allowed : Deduction in respect of employment of new employees Deduction in respect of certain inter-corporate dividends. 

2. Cannot set-off any loss carried forward from earlier years if such losses were incurred in respect of the above mentioned deductions/exemptions. 

3. If a Company opts to pay tax under these sections then it cannot be subsequently withdrawn.

 4. For Sec 115BAA company needs to file From 10-IC before due date of filing return.
data.description: Domestic companies have an option to opt for sec 115BAA and pay income tax at a lower rate of 22%. Effective tax rate of 25.63% (inclusive of surcharge and cess)
data.how_to_apply: The company must opt-in for this regime by filing Form 10-IC.
data.funding_mechanism: Claim by filing Income Tax Return .Opt in required by assessee- Yes
data.checklist_info_a:
1. PAN
2. Aadhar
3. Create an account in the Income Tax website
